UsernameRequirements:
Username must be:
• 3-20 characters long
• Can only contain letters, numbers, dots, and underscores
PasswordRequirements:
Password must be:
• 8-64 characters long
• Include at least one uppercase letter
• Include at least one lowercase letter
• Include at least one number
• Include at least one special character
ShowHidePass: Show or hide the password field
TempWarn: This action will remove all files within the selected directory, there is no way to recover what has been deleted.
